text: Ra yadi allahale manisaharuko noksani garna hatara garne bha'e, juna prakarale tiniharule pha'idako nimti hatara gardachan, bhane unako vacana uhile nai pura bha'isakne thiyo. Tasartha juna manisaharula'i hamisam'ma a'une kurako yakina chaina, tyastala'i hamile tyasai chadi dinchau, taki aphno ateripanama bhautari rahun
